name: Parkhotel Bremen
description: Set in Bremen’s Bürgerpark, this 5-star hotel offers free WiFi and a 1,200 m² spa area with heated outdoor pool and sauna area. Park Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Old Town and Bremen Main Train Station. The rooms at the Parkhotel Bremen – ein Mitglied der Hommage Luxury Hotels Collection, have been individually furnished with quality fabrics and many antique-furniture pieces. Some rooms offer views of Holler Lake. Smokers can enjoy fine cigars in the La Fumadora smoking lounge. Specials in the Parkhotel Bremen – ein Mitglied der Hommage Luxury Hotels Collection´s spa, are the ice grotto, 2 aromatic steam rooms and high-tech cardio machines in the 2-floor fitness area. The hotel is 550 metres from the ÖVB Arena and Trade Fair.

name: Atlantic Hotel Universum
description: The Hotel Universum is located next to the Science Center Universum Bremen and the Technologiepark, by the University of Bremen. This 4-star hotel is part of the major architectural concept "Universum Bremen" and through its direct affiliation with the Conference Centre provides one of the most modern meeting and events facilities in the city. Due to its close proximity to the university, with its renowned research facilities and the "Technologiepark Bremen", the hotel is ideal for both business travellers and conference delegates attending events in Bremen and its surrounding area.

name: Atlantic Hotel Galopprennbahn
description: This modern hotel is situated directly at the Galopprennbahn Bremen racecourse in Bremen's Vahr district, boasting peaceful, leafy surroundings and unbeatable views of the track from the terrace and rooms. Atlantic Hotel Galopprennbahn offers contemporary-styled rooms with plenty of daylight and a décor of light-coloured fabrics. Featured amenities include free Wi-Fi internet access. Start your day with the breakfast buffet overlooking the racecourse. Throughout the day, the Derby restaurant offers something to suit all tastes (please note different opening times). A three-tier terrace area opens towards the racecourse and is accessible both from the restaurant and from the events area. Guests arriving by car will find free private parking at the hotel.

name: Atlantic Grand Hotel Bremen
description: This 4-star superior hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and tea/coffee-making facilities. It is a 1-minute walk from Bremen Town Hall and the statue of the Bremen Town Musicians. All rooms feature a modern design with soundproofed windows, a comfortable seating area and work desk. The spacious bathrooms have a bath or shower. The Atlantic Grand Hotel Bremen has a spa area with sauna, steam room and a separate gym with modern fitness equipment. Massages can be booked here too. Bikes are available to rent at the lobby. The Atlantic’s restaurant with conservatory serves international cuisine.The lobby features a bar and smoking lounge. The River Weser is a 2-minute walk away. Bremen Central Train Station is 1 km from the Atlantic.

name: Hotel Heldt
description: Hotel Heldt features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Bremen. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is located 3.8 km from Bürgerweide. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Heldt can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bremen, like hiking and cycling. Bremen Central Station is 4.3 km from Hotel Heldt. The nearest airport is Bremen Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Havenhaus
description: Located in Bremen-Vegesack, 21 km from Bürgerweide, Hotel Havenhaus provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is set 22 km from Bremen Central Station, 47 km from Bremerhaven Central Station and 21 km from Harbour Museum Speicher XI. Free WiFi and room service are provided. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. ÖVB Arena is 21 km from Hotel Havenhaus, while Weserburg - Museum for modern Art is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Bremen Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Atlantic Hotel Landgut Horn
description: This 4-star hotel lies a 15-minute drive from the centre of Bremen in the district of Horn-Lehe. Use the free Wi-Fi hotspot which can be accessed throughout the hotel. Located in Bremen's green belt, the peaceful ATLANTIC Hotel Landgut Horn is removed from the busy city centre and set near a large park. Spacious, tastefully furnished rooms await you. Look forward to a complimentary breakfast buffet to get your day off to a good start. In the Victorian restaurant, enjoy a range of freshly prepared, seasonal dishes. In the evening, relax in the bar with a fresh draught beer or tasty cocktail. Small snacks are available here as well. Nearby public transport connections allow you to reach the city centre and main train station within 30 minutes.

name: Hotel Nordraum
description: This 3-star hotel offers modern rooms, free Wi-Fi and free parking. It is located south-east of Bremen city centre, just 400 metres from the Hemelingen exit of the A1 motorway. All rooms of the Hotel NordRaum include flat-screen TVs with SKY channels. A rich hotel buffet breakfast is available at the Hotel NordRaum. A newly opened restaurant is located adjacent to the hotel serving warm meals throughout the day. The Hotel NordRaum is less than a 15-minute drive from Bremen Airport, Bremen city centre, the Weserstadion (football stadium) and AWD Dome (exhibition centre). The Hotel NordRaum has a large free car park and is close to a motorway service station with a shop and fast-food restaurant.

name: Design Apartments Bremen
description: Offering free Wi-Fi access, the modern Design Apartments Bremen is situated in the Hastedt district of Bremen. Bennigsenstraße Tram Stop is a 12-minute walk away, providing connections to the historic city centre. Each apartment or suite offers a separate living area equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some apartments have a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. Guests can walk along the Weser River, a 10-minute walk from Design Apartments Bremen. Sports fans can reach the Weser Stadium on foot in 15 minutes. Guests enjoy free private parking, and easy access to the A1 motorway in 5 minutes.

name: Hotel Heldt Dependance
description: Hotel Heldt Dependance enjoys tranquil, green surroundings in the pretty Schwachhausen district of Bremen, 5 km from the city centre. It offers a traditional restaurant. Classically furnished rooms with a TV and en suite bathroom are offered at Hotel Heldt Dependance. Free WiFi is available in the restaurant area. A breakfast buffet is available daily. Many other restaurants are within a 10-minute walk. You can reach the Bremen Main Station and the Rhododendron Park within a 10-minute drive, or with Tram 4 which takes around 13 minutes.

name: Hotel Falk
description: This hotel is situated in Bremen’s Osterholz suburb, just a 15-minute drive from the city centre, and a 2-minute drive from the A27 motorway and Weserpark shopping and leisure centre. Look forward to comfortable, welcoming rooms at Hotel Falk, as well as a delicious and diverse breakfast buffet to enjoy in the mornings (included in room price). Make the most of free wireless internet access available throughout the hotel. Enjoy snacks and refreshments in the conservatory bistro. This hotel is the ideal base for day trips and activities in Bremen and the surrounding area.

name: Holiday Inn Express Bremen Airport
description: Holiday Inn Express Bremen Airport is located just 200 meters from Bremen Airport. The hotel offers 173 comfortable rooms on 5 floors, equipped with free tea and coffee making facilities, Wi-Fi is included. As a guest of our hotel, the extended continental breakfast is included*! After an evening walk, a visit to the Universum Bremen or a long day in the old town of Bremen, you can have a snack or a drink in our bar until late at night. In our hotel restaurant Grillfactory you can enjoy homemade burgers, delicious finger food and crunchy vegetables and salad. Our front desk is open 24 hours a day for your convenience. The Holiday Inn Express Airport Bremen also offers two modern equipped conference rooms with daylight and air conditioning. *Reduction of the rate by breakfast is not possible.Official Hotel Information

name: Aparthotel Adagio Bremen
description: Aparthotel Adagio Bremen occupies two floors of the Bremen City Gate on the station forecourt. The 94 comfortable, modern studios and apartments each have a full-fledged kitchen. Besides HD TV and free WiFi, the rooms have a workplace, making them ideal for longer stays. Excellent views of Bremen's Old Town and Bremen Central Station complete the package perfectly.accorhotels.com

name: Motel 24h Bremen
description: Located just a 10-minute drive from the centre of the Hanseatic city of Bremen in the neighbouring area of Oyten, this motel offers free Wi-Fi and free on-site parking. Each of the rooms at Motel 24h Bremen is functionally furnished and offers a wash basin, satellite TV and a small desk. Guests have access to shared bathrooms facilities located in the hallway. The family-friendly and pet-friendly Motel 24h Bremen boasts express check-in and check-out, and provides vending machines with both small snacks and drinks. The motel is set 13 km away from Achimer Golf Club. Check-in is also possible by machine 24/7. The A27 motorway is 500 metres away, and Bremen Airport is 18 km from the motel.

name: ibis budget Bremen City Center
description: The ibis budget Bremen City Center is located close to the train station. Start the day with a delicious breakfast, which you can book on site (10€ per person and night). The use of Wi-Fi is included in the entire house. A special feature of this hotel are the extra spacious rooms, which are equipped with a private bathroom including shower and toilet. Families also benefit from the room size. Up to three people can find space in the triple rooms, which are furnished with practical wardrobe beds. Due to the central location of the ibis budget Bremen City Center, the hotel offers you the ideal starting position to explore the Hanseatic city. It usually only takes a walk from the hotel into the city and from one sight to the next. For example, visit the Bremen Town Hall and the Roland statue, which are UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Also the airport Bremen as well as the A1 are quickly reached.Official Hotel Information

name: Best Western Hotel Achim Bremen
description: Our 3-star hotel in Achim near Bremen, completely renovated in 2019, is ideal for business travellers and city visitors who want to stay overnight in a convenient location. Due to the proximity to the motorways A1 and A27 you can reach the airport Bremen (15 kilometers) and the city centre Bremen (16 kilometers) quickly and easily by car. 120 parking spaces are available for our guests at the hotel for 2 € per day/car. For bus groups we offer up to three bus parking spaces. Ideal for business trips: The companies Vitakraft, Jacobs, Mercedes and Airbus are located very close to the Best Western Hotel Achim Bremen.bestwestern.com

name: Fährhaus Farge
description: Located directly on the river Weser, this family-run hotel offers free WiFi, a restaurant and bright rooms with river views. It is set less than 20 minutes' drive from Bremen. All rooms at Fährhaus Farge feature a flat-screen TV, seating area, and private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some also include a balcony. Regional specialties and seasonal dishes are served at the Fährhaus Farge restaurant. In warm weather gusts can enjoy meals and drinks outdoors on the terrace. The A270 motorway is 3.5 km from the hotel, and parking is available on site.

name: nicetostay
description: Located in Bremen in the Lower-Saxony region, nicetostay provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and walk-in shower. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Guests can also relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area. Bürgerweide is 7.7 km from nicetostay, while Bremen Central Station is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Bremen Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Bremer Apartmenthotel Superior
description: Located near the River Weser, this privately run hotel in the Hemelingen district of Bremen offers apartments with a fully equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi internet, and rich breakfast buffets. Less than 2 km from Bremen-Sebaldsbrück Train Station, the Bremer Apartmenthotel Superior has brightly decorated apartments with a combined living/sleeping area and a modern bathroom. On request, guests can enjoy a varied buffet in the Apartmenthotel’s breakfast room every day. The terrace is a great place to relax in the sun. Scenic hiking and cycling routes can be found near Lake Werdersee. Bremen city centre is about 5 km away from the Bremer Apartmenthotel.

name: Arthotel Bremen
description: Situated in the Hastedt district of Bremen, this hotel is just an 11-minute tram ride from the historic city centre. It offers rooms with free WiFi and a buffet breakfast. The rooms at artHotel Bremen feature box-spring beds, a satellite TV and complimentary toiletries in the private bathroom. Restaurants and cafes can be found within a 15-minute walk. The River Weser and the Werdersee lake holiday area are only a few minutes away and are ideal for walks. Sports fans can reach the Weserstadion stadium in just 15 minutes on foot. The A1 motorway is only 4.5 km from artHotel Bremen. Parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Zum Klüverbaum
description: This family-run hotel offers comfortable accommodation in the Blumenthal district of Bremen, close to the A270 motorway. Bremens historic city centre is a 25-minute drive away and easy to reach by train or bus. The Hotel Zum Klüverbaum features comfortably furnished rooms equipped with all of the standard amenities. You can also look forward to a tasty breakfast buffet each morning. Free WiFi internet access is available in all public areas of the hotel. Popular sights in Bremen include the historic Marktplatz (market square), the Schnoor quarter, and the impressive Bremer Dom cathedral.

name: Hotel Riede
description: This hotel offers cosy rooms with free Wi-Fi, a terrace, large garden and free parking spaces. It lies in a tranquil location to the east of Bremen. Many rooms at Hotel Riede Bremen have a kitchen and/or a terrace overlooking the garden. The hotel a is within a 12-minute drive from Bremen Airport, the Bremen Exhibition Centre, Bremen Main Station, Bremen University and the Weserstadion football stadium. An airport transfer service is available to/from Hotel Riede at an extra charge.

name: Hotel Zur Heidquelle
description: This hotel enjoys a quiet location in the Blumenthal district, a 20-minute drive from Bremen’s historic city centre. Hotel Zur Heidquelle offers free Wi-Fi and nostalgic-style interiors. Rooms at Zur Heidquelle Blumenthal feature elegant décor and solid wooden furniture. All rooms include satellite TV. A breakfast buffet is provided each morning in the elegant dining room. Here, the soft lighting and nostalgic prints create a romantic and historic ambience. On-site parking is free at the Heidquelle Bremen. Bremerhaven is 35 minutes away via the nearby A27 motorway.

name: Gästehaus fliegendes Perlhuhn Borgfeld
description: Located in Lilienthal, within 10 km of Bürgerweide and 14 km of Bremen Central Station, Gästehaus fliegendes Perlhuhn Borgfeld provides accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The inn features family rooms. At the inn, each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Gästehaus fliegendes Perlhuhn Borgfeld features certain rooms that include a balcony, and all rooms have a kettle. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lilienthal, like hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Bremen Airport, 19 km from Gästehaus fliegendes Perlhuhn Borgfeld.

name: Zum guten Schlaf
description: Set in the Gröpelingen district of Bremen, Zum guten Schlaf is 7.3 km from Bürgerweide. The property is non-smoking and is situated 7.1 km from Bremen Central Station. The rooms in the guest house are fitted with a kettle. At Zum guten Schlaf rooms are fitted with a balcony, a shared bathroom and a flat-screen TV. The nearest airport is Bremen Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.
